live_updates: The issue has been resolved. Thanks for your patience.
We're looking into it. Please be advised there is no ETA until the resolution at this time.  Stay tuned for further updates.
35079.summary: Some customers in East Vancouver surrounding the Mt Saint Joseph Hospital are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35079.title: Mar 17 – East Vancouver (Mt Saint Joseph Hospital)| All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Issues in the area have been resolved and found as a result of a power outage in the area.  We thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35049.summary: Some customers in Northwest Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35049.title: Mar 17 – Northwest Calgary| All Services - Outage (Resolved)
